relation.text: 1808 My Dear Sister , I am much concerned
s accident . As he is now
does not feel much inconvenience from it . My House is an Hospital . Five Children in the Measles ; three of whom , are now
last six weeks . A cold & Cough of an obstinate nature , which refused
three weeks ago . He was conducting
s or Campbell & his Wife , at any party I have been at . His character was notorious here , some Years
recovery did not last above two , or three days
attended his funeral out of Edinburgh , last Monday
